titleStmt.title: To the memory, of the incomparable Sir Andrevv Ramsey of Abbots-Hall. Provost of Edinburgh, counsellor to His Majesty, Lord of the Session, &c. Who departed thi life, January 17. 1688. A funeral elegie. / N. Paterson.
titleStmt.author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
